title: (x) small text face / Garamondesque - Hoefler Text {Nicola C}
author: waterytart

comments.content:
Based mostly on the j, I think this is Garamond, or Janson, but I'm not sure which.

- Mike Yanega

I have been getting dizzy looking at Garamonds, and I have had trouble finding an exact match for the 'a' and the 'g' in this sample. So far, URW's [Garamond No. 4](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014043/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/garamond-no-4/) is the best match I have found (medium weight).

- Mike Yanega

I realized the 'g' in Janson was not right, so I switched to the Garamonds.

- Mike Yanega

garamond it is.

thanks everyone for all your help!

I doubt it's Garamond. As far as I can tell, I'm pretty sure this is Hoefler Text, widely tracked. Hoefler Text design was inspired by Garamond No. 3 and Jenson/Kis, so that's why it resembles them both.

[http://typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100010](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014043/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100010 "http://typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100010")
